duties_responsibilities.duty: Create elegant and intuitive end-to-end customer journeys for pharmacy customers, expanding the vision from pharmacy to health to wellness.
Partner with product management and engineering team to champion customer-centric journeys by considering customer needs, market analysis, usability studies, and competition mapping.
Build conceptual diagrams, wireframes, high-fidelity mocks, click-throughs, and prototypes within Figma.
Effectively communicate design to stakeholders and partners at any level.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS or graduate degree in HCI, Psychology, or other related fields.
ADA certification is a big plus, but not required.
